item.description:
The Beautiful Bellydance

Meet other women who want to get in touch with their inner spirit & relax! This one-hour class brings together women of all backgrounds for a fun and exciting low-impact workout. Movements are broken down into body isolations which tone and strengthen muscles.

We will explore basic belly dance movement, Middle Eastern music and rhythm and look into the history of this beautiful dance. These classes also focus on posture with a warm-up and cool down.

As both a Belly Dance instructor and student, and performer, I’ve seen how these classes have given women a chance to meet other women and make long lasting friendships. It is also comforting for women to know that this is the only dance form where each woman’s movements do not have to be exactly like another's and that weight is not a requirement or an issue.

For more information or to contact Danita at (860) 794-1817 or go to www.growinggreenevents.com

6 pm
Cost $10
Growing Green Wellness Center

Followed by Zumba class at 7 pm
item.name: The Beautiful Bellydance
